attributes.additional_details:
We should ban the sun as it has done many disgusting things. For example recently releasing Prince Harry's naked photo's. Which looks terrible for the country.
Also what happened in the past with the hillsborough disaster. When they lied about what happened.
JFT96

rejection.details: In the UK, the press is not subject to state regulation. The Government believes that this is fundamental to our democracy. That is why the government does not interfere in what a newspaper or magazine chooses to publish
